name: INCar
desc: A specific electric vehicle that Maps uses during route planning and navigation.

items.name: init(carIdentifier: String, displayName: String?, year: String?, make: String?, model: String?, color: CGColor?, headUnit: INCar.HeadUnit?, supportedChargingConnectors: [INCar.ChargingConnectorType])
items.desc: Creates a car object with the specified attributes, head unit, and supported charging connectors.

items.name: var displayName: String?
items.desc: The electric vehicle’s user-defined display name.

items.name: var model: String?
items.desc: The manufacturer’s model name for the electric vehicle.

items.name: var year: String?
items.desc: The electric vehicle’s year of manufacture.

items.name: var headUnit: INCar.HeadUnit?
items.desc: The Bluetooth and iAP2 identifiers of the electric vehicle’s physical head unit.

items.name: class INCar.HeadUnit
items.desc: An object that contains the Bluetooth and iAP2 identifiers of the vehicle’s physical head unit.

items.name: var supportedChargingConnectors: [INCar.ChargingConnectorType]
items.desc: The charging connectors that the electric vehicle supports.

items.name: struct INCar.ChargingConnectorType
items.desc: Constants that describe the available charging connector types.

items.name: func maximumPower(for: INCar.ChargingConnectorType) -> Measurement<UnitPower>?
items.desc: Gets the maximum power for a specific type of charging connector.

items.name: func setMaximumPower(Measurement<UnitPower>, for: INCar.ChargingConnectorType)
items.desc: Sets the maximum power for a specific type of charging connector.
